operation.command: update BGEN.CIVILP set ETANP = 'LEPOISSON', ETAPRE = 'Aquaman' where ETACAF = '02018000007994'

select 1 from sgencli.cli_personne_physique pp inner join sgencli.cli_client c on pp.id_fk_client = c.id where c.histo_numero = '02018000007994' and pp.nom_patronymique = 'LEPOISSON' and pp.prenoms = 'Aquaman'
